ints [code]if(i == 13665) Your desired item id (the one you use after pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = Wear; String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 9998; DropInv Model class8.anInt165 = 9999; Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 9999; Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; Male armssleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; Female armssleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; Rotate updown - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; Rotate rightleft - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = Tri God WarSpear; Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = Has The Powers Of All Three Gods!.getBytes(); Item Examine }[/code]

item.title: Tri god warspear
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“pokerking, post:7, topic:264131”]i did make it i outlined your guys picture and added some stuff made it smaller and fixed some things and added animtion[/quote]You can’t proof anything. SilentCJ released it the first so it’s his © Copyright.
You cannot claim or earn the © Copyright in any way.
Just commit it, you leeched an already made costum item.
You can’t defend yourself. It’s SilentCJ’s his idea, you stole it and even didn’t made the model or just stretched it.

-ACF

Read full topic

good model, but the facts are, the ints are messed up, though ive fixed them

if(i == 1279) //change to what you want the code to be { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 9998;// DropInv Model class8.anInt165 = 9999; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 9999; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male armssleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female armssleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800;// Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498;// Rotate updown - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300;// Rotate rightleft - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Tri God WarSpear"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Has The Powers Of All Three Gods!".getBytes(); }
